code: import React from'react';import{userService}from'../../infrastructure';import placeholder_user_image from'../../assets/images/placeholder.png';const FriendChatBox=props=>{const{id,firstName,lastName,online}=props;const profilePicUrl=props.profilePicUrl||placeholder_user_image;let imgClassName='';if(profilePicUrl){imgClassName=userService.getImageSize(profilePicUrl);}let userNameFormatted=userService.formatUsername(firstName,lastName,21);let onlineStatusClass=online?'online-status':'offline-status';return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"messagebox-friend-container",onClick:e=>props.showUserChatBox({id,firstName,lastName,profilePicUrl},e)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:`fas fa-circle ${onlineStatusClass}`}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"messagebox-friend-image"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{className:imgClassName,src:profilePicUrl,alt:"profilePic"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"messagebox-username-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"messagebox-username"},userNameFormatted," ")));};export default FriendChatBox;
